job.title: Software Sr Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstrongImportant Notestrong During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrstrongTechnologystrong sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrAs a Software Senior Engineer in the CTO Testing Tools team you will support tools for tracking coordinating and automating Logical Day testing for the SecDevOps community Also be instrumental in developing a selfservice portal for a number of hosted applications such as LoadRunner Awetest Jenkins Tier1App suit Service Virtualization and gremlin onboarding Share your passion for the creation of automation processes from inception to deployment of quality code into production as part of the Technology transformation You will join an elite team of Engineers driving this transformation through the innovative agile delivery of quality products and services for 3000 applications utilizing 130 inhouse and offtheshelf software products the make up the CTO Enterprise Application Services toolsuite  You will help define the Self Service Portal design and endstate identify automation opportunities for rapid deployment software patching and upgrades as well as automation opportunities in the SecDevOps test preparation and test validation space This will include building and maintaining enterprise and proprietary capabilities that are fully integrated into CICD shaping metrics and reporting improving testing at scale to improve quality for 3000 applications as well as working with developers and lines of business to enable agile delivery of software and test productsbrbrstronguKey Responsibilities Includebrustrongul liLead the Logical Day LD test automation strategic initiative to accelerate test cycles and potentially reduce the test cycle duration including the integration of automated test preparation and test validation capabilities in collaboration with the LOB testing community to improve quality and enable functional performance service virtualization regression destructive resiliency chaos mobile and API testing in an agile environmentli liIdentify and resolve gaps in the Logical Day test approach throughout the test cycles including driving metadata needs and test data reservation using and enhancing processes and tools already in place li liBe able to visualize the Logical day test process across the enterprise to introduce continuous improvements and updates that enable the agile delivery of softwareli liEnhance existing andor develop and implement new test data management solutions and enhancements to support test data extracts sanitizing and reservation of data sourced from multiple sources for improved data availability to satisfy data needs during LD test cycles li liDevelop capabilities to stand up a Self Service portal for the QA tool suite hosted and supported by CTO Testing Tools Engineering teambrbrliulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli7 years of software engineering experiencelili3 years of database experience with at least two of the following platforms Informix PostgreSQL MySQL MongoDB Progresslili3 years of experience designing and implementing process solutions for automationlili2 years of experience creating visual reports with one or combination of the following SSRS Tableau or PowerBIlili3 years of development experience with languages such as Python Java Scala or RbrbrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliAn industrystandard technology certificationliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillslili3 years of Maven experience Gradle experience or combination of bothliliExperience with automation regression and performance testingliliKnowledge and understanding of Git or GitHubliliAbility to articulate complex concepts in a clear mannerliliAbility to motivate staff to prioritize work meet deadlines achieve goals and work under pressure in a dynamic and complex environmentliliExperience applying new technologies to business needs in a technologically innovative  changedriven organizationbrbrliulstronguOther Desired Qualificationsbrustrongul liExperience with BuildPlatform tools Jenkinsli liExperience with one or more additional technology capabilities Artifactory Gitlab SonarQubeli liExperience with one or more additional Platforms AWS PCF Kubernetes Grafana ElasticELK AppDynamics
